plot: Director Ben Shirinian captures both the power and poise of ballet in an evocative new short film featuring world renowned dancer Guillaume Cote.
title: Lost in Motion
plot_es: Director Ben Shirinian captures both the power and poise of ballet in an evocative new short film featuring world renowned dancer Guillaume Cote.
plot_en: Director Ben Shirinian captures both the power and poise of ballet in an evocative new short film featuring world renowned dancer Guillaume Cote.
